attributes.action: Create a job specification for UK Members of Parliament (MPs) with clear roles, responsibilities and desired skills & experience.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Amazingly, MPs do not have a job specification. This makes it impossible to (a) assess a candidate's suitability for the job based on their skills and experience and (b) measure their performance once they have been elected. Most of the UK working population requires a job specification. PLEASE sign this petition to make your MP more accountable.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
